page.title: 17Transport in Pitreavie.
page.content: In our area there is quite good transport. We have one railway station in the south of our grid, which handles forty-three trains every twenty-four hours, except for coal trains. There are 11 bus sevices in this area, 5 follow Queensferry Road and the others link housing estates with the City of Dunfermline. There are lots of private buses used for taking people to work and there is a free service to the supermarket as well as buses to Perth and the north and some buses to England. A lot of people are now hiring mini-buses to suit their life styles. Stephen Gilkes.
